The word ‘philistine’ does not derive from Palestine, palestine derives from philistine which is the actual Arabic and Hebrew pronunciation of the same word. Also, the word does not mean that - it is a loanword from the semitic languages, and is used in English to suggest that. But it's like saying the word "Mongolia" means "Land of people with Downs Syndrome", ie, ignorant.
